definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
It is better to travel hopefully than to arrive.
pinyin: dai4 zhe5 xi1 wang4 qu4 lu:3 xing2 , bi3 dao4 da2 zhong1 dian3 geng4 mei3 hao3
containing_words.word: 帶著希望去旅行，比到達終點更美好

sentences.english: Heartless laugh, was the best thing that I have.
sentences.chinese: 隃罏沒心沒肺的笑，是我擁有的最美好的東西。

sentences.english: She carries herself very nicely and attracts all the men.
sentences.chinese: 她體態美好，吸引着所有的男人。

sentences.english: And did you know that there are really zillions of ways to prepare a great seafood meal?
sentences.chinese: 你知道嗎，準備一頓美好的海鮮大餐有無數種方法？

sentences.english: Each good thing is hard to begin.
In short, maternal instinct is wonderful, but it has its limits.
sentences.chinese: 總之，母性本能是美好的，但它有其侷限性。
你讓我的生命如此美好，荷莉。

sentences.english: I miss the good old days, 'she added sentimentally .
sentences.chinese: “我懷念過去那些美好的日子，”她動情地補充道。

sentences.english: "Crossing" during the struggle for the self-transcendence, "Mori" for a better future.
sentences.chinese: “渡”爲自我超越的奮鬥過程，“森”爲美好前景。

sentences.english: The good prospect of Liaoning lets us be in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 遼寧的美好前景讓我們喜不自勝。

sentences.english: A lift your veil, once touched many hearts.
sentences.chinese: 一首掀起你的蓋頭來，曾打動了多少美好的心靈。

sentences.english: We, we heard about this wonderful little Sicilian restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 我們，我們聽到了這個美好的小西西里餐廳。

sentences.english: We look forward to your sincere cooperation for a better future.
sentences.chinese: 我們期待與您精誠合作，共創美好的未來。

sentences.english: This is the best moment of your life!
sentences.chinese: 這就是你生命中最美好的一刻。

sentences.english: Dorothea seized this as a precious permission .
sentences.chinese: 多蘿西婭認爲這是一個美好的允諾。

sentences.english: Without an open society there can be no new-type economy.
sentences.chinese: 新疆經濟和社會發展的前景是美好的。

sentences.english: Nothing will be able to erase our wonderful memories, we will remember them forever.
sentences.chinese: 沒什麼能抹掉我們美好的記憶，我們會永遠銘記在心。

definition: to yearn for/to look forward to
sth small that one can find pleasure in (e.g. a cold beer after a hard day or a serendipitous find in a second-hand store)
